description: Metrics for transaction P2P gossip and the local view of mempool data

panels.description: Tracks a heuristic of the memory footprint of the various transaction pool sub-pools
panels.title: Subpool sizes in bytes

panels.description: Tracks the number of transactions in the various transaction pool sub-pools
panels.title: Subpool transaction count

panels.description: Number of transactions about to be imported into the pool.
panels.title: Pending pool imports

panels.description: Tracks the number of transaction messages in the channel from the network to the transaction pool
panels.title: Network transaction channel

panels.description: Tracks the number of transactions per second that are inserted and removed from the transaction pool, as well as the number of invalid transactions per second.
panels.title: Inserted transactions
Transactions Manager Poll Duration Nested Function Calls

panels.description: Tracks the entries, byte size, failed inserts and file deletes of the blob store
panels.title: Blob store

panels.description: Duration spent inside one call to poll the `TransactionsManager` future
panels.title: Transactions Manager Future Poll Duration

panels.description: Duration spent inside one call to poll the `NetworkManager` future
panels.title: Network Manager Future Poll Duration
Network Manager Poll Duration Nested Function Calls

panels.description: Frequency of a peer sending a transaction that has already been marked as seen by that peer. This could for example be the case if a transaction is sent/announced to the peer at the same time that the peer sends/announces the same transaction to us.

targets.legendFormat: Freq Announced Transactions Already Seen by Peer
Freq Received Transactions Already Seen by Peer

panels.title: Frequency of Transactions Already Marked as Seen by Peer

panels.description: Total number of times a transaction is sent/announced that is already in the local pool.

targets.legendFormat: Freq Announced Transactions Already in Pool
Freq Received Transactions Already in Pool

panels.title: Frequency of Transactions Already in Pool

title: reth - mempool
